Growth in low-emissions power expected to cover demand - IEAPower generated from low-emissions sources, such as wind, solar and nuclear, will be adequate to meet growth in global demand for the next three years, the International Energy Agency (IEA) said, adding power sector emissions are on the decline. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 07:06:15 GMT 7VIQWHWZ3ZLEFHBWC6JSLIEXII https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/growth-low-emissions-power-expected-cover-demand-iea-2024-01-24/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
ASML orders surge to record in Q4, but keeps 2024 outlook unchangedChipmaking equipment maker ASML Holding on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings that beat expectations and its best-ever quarterly orders, but it kept a cautious outlook for 2024 as it faces new restrictions on exports to China. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 06:34:43 GMT LPATJEL25RKL5IMG75XSIODXPA https://www.reuters.com/technology/asml-fourth-quarter-earnings-beat-expectations-keeps-outlook-unchanged-2024-01-24/Toby Sterling技术
Taiwan president-elect signals desire to join US-led trade frameworkTaiwan's president-elect, Lai Ching-te, signalled on Wednesday his desire for Taipei to join the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework, considering the island's key role in the global economy. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 06:20:14 GMT MTMTFGQWRNNNGNBEMSKW4A4OPOQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-elect-signals-desire-join-us-led-trade-framework-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
China short sellers retreat as contrarians sense an opportunityGlobal investors aren't expecting much from China's economy this year, but some say the collapse in its already cheap stocks merits a wager on an eventual rebound and perhaps a new approach to investing in the market. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:46:49 GMT TJNOPZE3AFI75DP5PMR6LPW2MI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-short-sellers-retreat-contrarians-sense-an-opportunity-2024-01-24/Summer Zhen世界中国

Three firefighters among six killed in gas truck explosion in Mongolia - officialsAt least six people were killed including three firefighters after a truck carrying 60 tons of liquefied natural gas exploded in the Mongolian capital of Ulaanbaatar on Wednesday, according to Mongolia's emergency officials. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:36:25 GMT KVYWF2R5K5OVZONICD7U4JNNQA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ Three-firefighters-among-six-killed-gas-truck-explosion-mongolia-officials-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
